sourceContent.title: Page A (Visible by Default)
sourceContent.relevance: This is the starting point. Visiting it is required for Checkpoint 1.

sourceContent.title: Page B (Hidden, Required for Checkpoint 2)
sourceContent.relevance: This page is required for Checkpoint 2, but it is hidden until Moment 1 is tripped.

sourceContent.title: Page C (Hidden, Triggers Moment 1)
sourceContent.relevance: This page must be visited to trip Moment 1, which reveals Page B. However, this page itself is hidden until Moment 2 is tripped.
